sentences.sContent: I went to stay with my uncle and aunt for a few days.
sentences.sCn: 我去和叔叔婶婶住了几天。

synos.tran: 叔叔；伯父；伯伯；舅父；姨丈；姑父

phrases.pCn: [口]山姆大叔（美国政府的绰号）
汤姆叔叔；逆来顺受的美国黑人

trans.tranOther: used by children, in front of a first name, to address or refer to a man who is a close friend of their parents
